events.message: I received my order today, but the product is faulty with multiple scratches and it does not work properly.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect based on the customer's description of damage and malfunction.
The case has been assigned to customer support representative Jamie for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about the issue with your product. I'm here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the faulty parts so we can assess the damage and find the best solution?
I have attached the pictures showing the scratches on the surface and how the device fails to turn on at all.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer to receive a replacement rather than a refund if possible, as I still want to use your product.
We have processed your replacement order, which will be shipped within 2 business days. You will receive a tracking number shortly.
We just wanted to check in and make sure your replacement product arrived and is working as expected. Please reach out if you need any more help.
Since we have received confirmation that your replacement arrived in good condition, we are now closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
